snippet: A Superior Court judge on Tuesday agreed to send a union-backed lawsuit over the state’s sweeping 2011 public pension reform to a jury trial, scheduled for April 20, a court spokesman said.
abstract: Superior Court judge in Rhode Island agrees to send a union-backed lawsuit over state's sweeping 2011 public pension overhaul to a jury trial in April 2015.
lead_paragraph: A Superior Court judge on Tuesday agreed to send a union-backed lawsuit over the state’s sweeping 2011 public pension reform to a jury trial, scheduled for April 20, a court spokesman said.

headline.main: Rhode Island: Jury May Decide Pension Lawsuit
headline.print_headline: Rhode Island: Jury May Decide Pension Lawsuit
